dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: Libtirpc is a port of Suns Transport-Independent RPC library to Linux.
dependencies.name: libtirpc

dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.
dependencies.name: m4

description:
PVM (Parallel Virtual Machine) is a software package that permits a
heterogeneous collection of Unix and/or Windows computers hooked
together by a network to be used as a single large parallel computer.
name: pvm

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enables -fPIC compilation flag on static libraries.
variants.name: fpic
